preqs: For Early Years Education: EDF3050For Early Years and Primary Education: EDF3052For Primary Education (single and double degrees): EDF3053For Primary and Secondary Health and Physical Education: EDF3057

rules.ruleString: Must have enrolled in an (I/W) unit in {EDF3053}
Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {EDF3050, EDF3052, EDF3053, EDF3057}

description: This unit monitors primary professional experience in the Bachelor of Education (Honours). Students complete the required number of days and the activities specified in the unit guide. Students' learning is supported by relevant academic staff in the Faculty of Education, and by teacher mentors in the education setting in which they are placed.
